You show them a door, and you say "Dont go through that door, dont take drugs, we forbid it. Its against the authoritarian demands. Dont experiment with what behind the forbidden mystery door."

Of course, that was not your intent, no matter how much you delude yourselves. You create drug-possession laws so lax, that possessing drugs is easy and safe.

 You are all living a lie. I have always rejected all drugs. I am triumphant. I embraced Truth. I am Superior.
